overview:
Antonio started recruiting for the industry he was once actively working with in, which has provided him with a huge advantage, as he has a clear understanding of the technologies, process’s and environment with in. Above and beyond his experience, Antonio has a passion for this unique, exciting and constantly evolving industry.

Feel free to get in touch & read through some brief references below - 0414 726 039 or antonio@clubdigital.com.au

Specialties

  • Search Engine Marketers - SEO, SEM, PPC, Search Managers & Directors, Head of Search
  • Social Media Marketers - SMM, SMO, SM Managers & Directors, Head of SM
  • Online Marketing Managers & Directors
  • Analyst - Web, Data, Search, Social Media
  • Designers - Interactive, Flash
  • Art Directors
  • Developers - FrontEnd, Flash, .NET, PHP
  • UX Specialists
  • Producers
  • Account Managers & Directors
  • Strategists & Planners
  • Creative Directors
  • Head of Digital, Digital Directors
  • GM, CEO
